about.about: My name is Keegan Niekerk , an 18 year old aspiring developer.I enjoy gaming , anime , hiking and finding new interesting things to learn about. From a young age , I was always fascinated by the new and cool  changes in technology. I may not be very experienced and skilled at the moment , but I am dedicated and always willing to learn more and up-skilling myself.

skills.level: I know my way around a computer.
I am always going to be there when asked.
Able to adapt and learn to new things
Ability to pay close attention to small changes.

testimonials.name: Oyintanda Zongwana
testimonials.testimony: Working with Keegan has been an absolute pleasure! Their dedication, and creativity have exceeded all expectations. They consistently deliver results and are a true asset to any team. I highly recommend Keegan for their outstanding skills and professionalism.

testimonials.name: Marcus Adonis
testimonials.testimony: Keegan is a hardworking person with good ideas that help solve problems and make meaningful impact. He enjoys helping others the best he can and does well as a team player

testimonials.name: Chandre Leigh Davids
testimonials.testimony: Keegan is one of the most creative, and most innovative people I know, He never backs down from a challenge and is for sure someone you'd be more than pleased with on your team in terms of his problem solving skills.

testimonials.name: Gwiba Mabandla
testimonials.testimony: Keegan is very calm and collective towards his work and will try to look for the most effective solution to a problem he has and always gets the job done.

testimonials.name: Chloe Almazien
testimonials.testimony: The Keegan have come to know is a diligent young man who takes pride in his work, always driven to improve his skill set as well as his mentality. Among many other things he is welcoming and noble to a tea ,never passing by anyone in need of assistance.

testimonials.name: Matthew Brown
testimonials.testimony: Keegan is an attentive and diligent worker. He always pays attention during lectures and always asking for help when needed.He's always one to help the other students when they need it and a solid asset to the team.

projects.description: My original portfolio , made only with CSS , Bootstrap and HTML.
My attempt at remaking the hulu website.
A very simple application that converts RBG values into HEX values.
A fully functioning calculator made with JavaScript.
A website that converts your current age to the exact amount of days
A practice e-commerce project made with JavaScript
